items.name: Pillars Lager Mixed
items.desc: A MIXED 24 CASE OF PILLARS LAGERS! HALF UNTRADITIONAL LAGER AND HALF REBELL HELLES 330ML CANS FOR THOSE WHO JUST CAN'T CHOOSE BETWEEN THE TWO.

items.name: Pillars Pilsner
items.desc: THE WORLDS MOST POPULAR BEER STYLE IS GIVEN THE PILLARS TREATMENT. 4%, GLUTEN-FREE AND VEGAN-FRIENDLY. THIS IS A PILSNER FOR THE PEOPLE.

items.name: Pillars Tropical Pilsner
items.desc: SUMMER BEER IS HERE AND IT'S TOTALLY TROPICAL, MAN! OUR BEST SELLING PILLARS PILSNER WITH A WITH A MOUTH-WATERING FRUITY TWIST. MEET TROPICAL PILSNER! INFUSED WITH GUAVA, PINEAPPLE, MANGO AND LYCHEE. PERFECT FOR BBQS AND GARDEN GARDEN CHILL TIMES.

items.name: Untraditional Lager
items.desc: A HOPPY LAGER WITH FLAVOURS OF APRICOT, PASSION FRUIT AND CITRUS. CLEAN, CRISP AND REFRESHING

items.name: Rebell Helles
items.desc: AWARD WINNING MODERN LAGER WITH A RIOT OF GOLDEN, FULL-BODIED FLAVOUR

items.name: Pillars Icebock
items.desc: A SUPERBLY DRINKABLE CARAMEL LAGER BREWED OVER SIX MONTHS AND THEN FROZEN IN TANK FOR A CLEAN DRINKING EXPERIENCE
